|- wi(w3a(wcel(c7, clmod), wcel(c2, cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c7))), wcel(c4, c5)), wcel(co(c2, c6, c4), c5))
-| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c7))
-| wceq(cfv(csca, c7), cfv(csca, c7))
-| wceq(c6, cfv(cvsca, c7))
-| wceq(cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c7)), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c7)))
body.pretty:
⊢ ((c7 ∈ LMod ∧ c2 ∈(Base `(Scalar ` c7))∧ c4 ∈ c5)→(c2[c6]c4)∈ c5)
⊣ c5 =(Base ` c7)
⊣ (Scalar ` c7)=(Scalar ` c7)
⊣ c6 =(× ` c7)
⊣ (Base `(Scalar ` c7))=(Base `(Scalar ` c7))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, crg)), wa(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5))), wcel(co(c2, c6, c4), c5))
-| wceq(c7, co(c0, cmat, c1))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c1))
-| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c7))
-| wceq(cfv(csca, c7), cfv(csca, c7))
-| wceq(c6, cfv(cvsca, c7))
-| wceq(cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c7)), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c7)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (((c0 ∈ Fin ∧ c1 ∈ Ring)∧(c2 ∈ c3 ∧ c4 ∈ c5))→(c2[c6]c4)∈ c5)
⊣ c7 =(c0[Mat]c1)
⊣ c3 =(Base ` c1)
⊣ c5 =(Base ` c7)
⊣ (Scalar ` c7)=(Scalar ` c7)
⊣ c6 =(× ` c7)
⊣ (Base `(Scalar ` c7))=(Base `(Scalar ` c7))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, crg)), wa(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5))), wcel(co(c2, c6, c4), c5))
-| wceq(c7, co(c0, cmat, c1))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c1))
-| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c7))
-| wceq(c6, cfv(cvsca, c7))
-| wceq(cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c7)), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c7)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (((c0 ∈ Fin ∧ c1 ∈ Ring)∧(c2 ∈ c3 ∧ c4 ∈ c5))→(c2[c6]c4)∈ c5)
⊣ c7 =(c0[Mat]c1)
⊣ c3 =(Base ` c1)
⊣ c5 =(Base ` c7)
⊣ c6 =(× ` c7)
⊣ (Base `(Scalar ` c7))=(Base `(Scalar ` c7))

body.origin: |- wceq(cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c7)), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c7)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, crg)), wa(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5))), wcel(co(c2, c6, c4), c5))

comment: Closure of the scalar multiplication in the matrix ring. ( ~ lmodvscl analog.) (Contributed by AV, 27-Nov-2019.)
